title: Final round of voting for pie/atom/(n)echo name?
summary:
Voting is open. OpenPoll Names were vetted until 31 July 2003 while putting out an all-blogs call to vote. Please Blog the Vote.
Source: NameFinalVote - Atom Wiki

Is this final? Gawd, I hope so. I’m stringing too many slash-inated names together these days. :)

<p>I voted for Feedcast, since it seems to be the least “clever” name yet identifies the concept.  It could be used in corp-speak and geek-speak without too much wincing.  And it’s not an acronym.  All good things, in my short span of experience.</p>
